author: ryanleeschneider
content:
Mentioning this here for more visibility: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues/378

geth is using `withdrawal.address` but the spec says `withdrawal.recipient`.  Discussion on the geth issue I opened seemed to indicate that `address` was preferred since it better matches whats in the EIP and CL layer, I've been out sick basically since posting that issue though so haven't had a chance to see what other ELs are returning in their e.g. `eth_getBlockByNumber` responses, but hoping we can settle on one or the other before Sepolia (ideally) or mainnet (worse case).
